intent_atoms.description: Consolidate scattered manual badge implementations in ISOInspectorApp into consistent, reusable FoundationUI DS.Badge component for displaying parse status, error levels, and processing indicators.

All three manual badge implementations (CorruptionBadge, SeverityBadge, ParseStateBadge) are migrated to use DS.Badge with correct level mappings and preserve tooltip, accessibility labels, and macOS focusable behavior.
Import FoundationUI in Sources/ISOInspectorApp/Tree/ParseTreeOutlineView.swift and remove unused .iconName extension from ParseIssue.Severity.
Add @todo #I1.1 comments for future DS.Indicator usage at specified locations (ParseTreeOutlineView.swift:550-552 and ParseTreeDetailView.swift:138-139).
